SQL: SELECT DISTINCT RSD.PURCHASE_DATE, RSD.MANUFACTURE_DATE, RSD.OVERINSURED_DATE, RSD.TOTAL_PRICES, RSD.OUTPUT_AMOUNT, RSM.SUB_NAME, RSM.SPECIFICATION_TYPE, RSC.CATEGORY_NAME, RSM.UNIT, RSM.SUPPLIER, RSM.PRICE, RAR.REPOSITORY_NAME, RAR.ORGANIZATION_CLASSIFY, RSD.CREATE_DATE, RSD.CREATE_BY FROM REP_STORAGE_DETAIL RSD LEFT JOIN REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE RSM ON RSM.UUID = RSD.MESSAGEID LEFT JOIN REP_SUBSTANCE_STORAGE RSS ON RSS.UUID = RSD.NUMBERID LEFT JOIN REP_ACCESS_REPOSITORY RAR ON RAR.UUID = STORAGE_WAREHOUSE LEFT JOIN REP_SUBSTANCE_CATEGORY RSC ON RSC.UUID = RSM.SUB_CATEGORY LEFT JOIN T_S_USERCARDINFO tsu ON RSD.create_by = tsu.user_name LEFT JOIN t_s_user tsus ON tsu.user_card_id = tsus.cardid LEFT JOIN T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub ON tsrub.userid = tsus. ID WHERE tsrub.orgid IN ( SELECT T . ID FROM T_S_DEPART T START WITH T . ID = ( SELECT DISTINCT tsrub.orgid FROM T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub WHERE tsrub.userid = '${userId}' ) CONNECT BY T .parentdepartid = PRIOR T . ID ) AND (RSD.ISDELETED IS NULL OR RSD.ISDELETED = 0) ORDER BY RSD.CREATE_DATE DESC
